plot: Dave Grant interrogates people with mysterious powers as a part of an FBI counter-terrorism agency. One day he runs into a man whose power he cant seem to figure out.
title: The Secret Adventures of Mr. Grant
plot_es: Dave Grant interrogates people with mysterious powers as a part of an FBI counter-terrorism agency. One day he runs into a man whose power he cant seem to figure out.
original_name: The Secret Adventures of Mr. Grant
plot_en: Dave Grant interrogates people with mysterious powers as a part of an FBI counter-terrorism agency. One day he runs into a man whose power he cant seem to figure out.
